Articles.Content:
Hi all, is there a way to force the game to enable highlight FX without the need to enable FXAA?

I'm trying to maximize my framerate, at the expense of visual quality.

I'm using the Dang It! random failures mod, and highlight fx needs to be turned on in order for me to see where the failures are (they will be flashing glowing red).

Also, in the VAB it highlights the parts when I mouseover the stages, for easier stage planning.

With FXAA turned on to 2x, my fps drops from 20+ to 10+. Still playable I know, but just a little cumbersome.

Any method to force enable highlight FX without FXAA? Maybe through the config files or something?

^Console (ALT+F12) showing warning messages regarding Highlight FX
